metadata.title: USN-3607-1 -- Screen Resolution Extra vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Screen Resolution Extra was using PolicyKit in an unsafe manner. A local attacker could potentially exploit this issue to bypass intended PolicyKit authorizations.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3607-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  screen-resolution-extra - 0.17.1.1~14.04.1 No subscription required
